iati-activity.title: Somaliland Development Fund aligned to the priorities of National Development Plan
iati-activity.description: To improve governance, accountability and public service delivery (e.g. in health and education) by the Government of Somaliland. This will promote long-term stability in the region and improve the lives of poor Somalilanders. This programme contributes to our MDGs by delivering public services, and building core government capacity and functions and will result in improved planning and delivery for development priorities by 2016.

iati-activity.title: Somalia Stability Programme
iati-activity.description: DFID support will build a greater number of areas of stability in in Somalia, benefiting approximately 4 million Somalis. Specifically, 900 communities will receive improved infrastructure, 72,000 people will feel safe from armed violence, 87 communities will have stronger and more legitimate local administrations and 72 existing peace agreements will be upheld with an additional 44 new peace agreements secured.
